name: コスモドリーマー
summary:
It was late at night on a snowy day.
A girl named "Yumegiri Mu" is relaxing in her room
when she looks out the window and notices something strange!

"The kids in town are flying into the sky!
Where the hell are we going?"

Wondering, Mu's curiosity filled her,
and she changed into her other clothes and
jumped out the window!

Why are these kids flying...
and why do I get to fly too...

The dreamy Muu proceeded to aim high in the sky
and far away without a care in the world.
info:
• 别名: CosmoDreamer
  • 平台: PC
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2020年10月2日
  • 售价: $7.99
  • 制作: あうとさいど
